comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos of the Schneider Coast Defence Train:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4910524850/in/photostream/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4909923979/in/photostream/]
Note that Bain's captions on these photos employ the British spelling of "defence." Did he not know how to spell American? Or did he obtain the pix from a British source?

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Obviously they had to recruit very tall men for that job.  :)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: They probably scouted basketball teams for recruits. I hope that the men below the top guy in the tube were provided with air holes -- or breathing hoses, at least.
